All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bet
    A bet is taken by the Gambler and processed by the BettingRound class.
    BettingRound
    Class for managing a round of betting.
    BettingRoundEndLog
    Class to manage the end of a betting round
    BettingRoundStartLog
    Class to manage the beginning of a betting round
    Card
    Class for cards
    CardHandedInLog
    Class to manage when a GamblingCard is handed by the cashier
    CardHandedOutLog
    Class to manage when a GamblingCard is handed back to the cashier
    Cashier
    Class to manage cards
    CashierTest  
    Game
    Class for creating a game and starting rounds
    GameRound
    Class for a game round of a specific game
    GameRules
    Class for managing game rules
    Machine
    Machine is a class to manage the bets of gamblers.
